name: agent-relay
description: Real-time agent-to-agent communication system for CLI agents (Claude Code, Codex, Cursor)
author: khaliqgant

packages.name: using-agent-relay
packages.description: Skill for coordinating multiple AI agents - enables real-time inter-agent messaging via PTY wrapper or file-based inbox system

packages.name: agent-relay-snippet
packages.description: AGENTS.md / CLAUDE.md snippet for agents on how to use agent-relay

packages.name: agent-relay-protocol
packages.description: Internal protocol snippet with session persistence, continuity, and trajectory tracking for dashboard integration

packages.name: using-beads-bv
packages.description: Skill for dependency-aware task planning with beads (bd) CLI and bv graph sidecar - covers ready work selection, priority management, and robot flags
